attributes.action: To stop Nicola sturgeon destroying the UK with another independence referendum
attributes.additional_details: The result of the Scottish referendum clearly states that the UK is one country not 4 individual countries we vote as one and abide by that result the SNP had their chance and the people voted to remain a UNITED KINGDOM
attributes.background: We want Nicola sturgeon to stop ripping the UK apart and accept the results of the EU referendum. the Country voted to BREXIT the whole overall country the country as one the UNITED KINGDOM .not as individual countries we stand as one the UK

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134361
